name: #10 Starship Escape
description:
(Created for the 2021 Cryptex Jam)

You are awakened from cold sleep to respond to unexpected damage to your colony transport ship. Can you successfully save the crew, repair the crippled vessel, and get back on course to the distant colony on Starship Escape?

Written by Darren Miller
Graphics by Errol Elumir and  Darren Miller

An illustrated 8-bit adventure game made with Adventuron.
